item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 20.12 Release Notes
item.description: Major Features Aspose.PUB for C++ 20.12 is based on latest .NET version 20.12. Got Queries? If you have any query related to Aspose.PUB for C++ API, please feel free to write to reach us on Aspose.PUB forum. We’ll be glad to assist you with your inquiries.

item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 20.11 Release Notes
item.description: Major Features Since this monthly release 20.11 Aspose.PUB for C++ is available for the Linux platform. Got Queries? If you have any query related to Aspose.PUB for C++ API, please feel free to write to reach us on Aspose.PUB forum. We’ll be glad to assist you with your inquiries.

item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 20.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.PUB for C++ 20.9. Improvements and Changes This month’s release of Aspose.PUB for C++ uses the latest version of the shared codeporting library. The API has also been updated to include the latest implementation of Aspose.PDF for C++ library, thus enhancing the overall functionality of the API.

item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 20.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.PUB for C++ 20.7. Improvements and Changes This month’s release of Aspose.PUB for C++ uses the latest version of the shared codeporting library. The API has also been updated to include the latest implementation of Aspose.PDF for C++ library, thus enhancing the overall functionality of the API.

item.title: Aspose.PUB for CPP 20.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.PUB for C++ 20.6. Aspose.PUB for C++ API has been launched! We are glad to share the launch of Aspose.PUB for C++ API.Â It is a native C++ library that allows developers to read Microsoft Public files (.pub). It also allows us to convert .pub files to PDF without the need of any other software. The API lets you work with publication files without understanding the underlying file format structure.
